appSubtitle: Sanin ainihin saurin intanet na yankinku
mostUsedNetworks: Hanyoyin sadarwa da aka fi amfani da su a {city}
resultsSubtitle: Ga kallon aikin intanet ɗinku na yanzu.
recommendation_great_4k: Saurinku yana da kyau don yawo bidiyo na 4K.
recommendation_great_hd: Saurinku yana da kyau don yawo bidiyo na HD.
recommendation_good_calls: Saurinku yana da kyau don kiran bidiyo da yawo.
recommendation_slow_video: Saurinku na iya zama a hankali don yawo bidiyo.
dataUsed: Gwajin ya yi amfani da kusan {dataUsed} MB na bayanai.
shareSummary: Na gwada saurin intanet dina da myareaspeed! Saukewa: {download} Mbps, Aikewa: {upload} Mbps, Ping: {ping} ms. Gwada saurin ka!
shareExperienceSubtitle: Taimaki wasu ta hanyar raba sakamakonka a ɓoye.
feedbackModalSubtitle: Taimaka wa al'ummarmu da sakamakonka ba tare da bayyana suna ba.
experienceTags: Don me kake amfani da intanet?
commentPlaceholder: Misali, Yana da kyau don kira amma a hankali don saukewa...
error_ratingRequired: Da fatan za a ba da kima.
communityHubSubtitle: Duba abin da wasu ke faɗi game da saurin intanet a yankinku.
communitySearchSubtitle: Nemo rahotannin aikin intanet na ainihi daga masu amfani a fadin Najeriya.
searchPlaceholder: Nemo ta wuri... Misali, Victoria Island, Lekki, Abuja
aboutText1: myareaspeed aikace-aikacen gwajin saurin intanet ne da aka tsara don ba da bayanai na musamman na yanki da ra'ayoyin al'umma, wanda aka kera don masu amfani a Najeriya da Afirka.
aboutText2: Mun yi imanin cewa kowa ya cancanci samun cikakken bayani game da aikin intanet ɗinsa, ba kawai a matsayin lamba ba, amma a cikin mahallin wurinsa da bukatunsa.
aboutText3: Kobowallet Innovation ne ya kirkiro wannan aikin, kamfanin fasaha da ke da niyyar samar da mafita masu amfani ga kalubalen yau da kullum.
aboutMissionText: Manufarmu ita ce karfafa masu amfani da intanet da bayanai masu gaskiya da kuma dandamali don raba kwarewarsu. Ta hanyar tattara bayanan aiki, muna da niyyar ƙirƙirar cikakken taswirar ingancin intanet, don taimaka wa masu amfani su yanke shawara mai kyau game da masu ba da sabis.
privacyIntro: Sirrinka yana da mahimmanci a gare mu. Wannan manufar tana bayanin irin bayanan da muke tattarawa da yadda muke amfani da su.
privacyDataText1: Lokacin da ka gudanar da gwajin sauri, muna tattara waɗannan bayanan ba tare da suna ba:
privacyDataPoint1: Sakamakon gwajin sauri (saukewa, aikawa, ping, jitter).
privacyDataPoint2: Adireshin IP ɗinka, wanda muke amfani da shi don sanin ISP da wurinka (birni/ƙasa). Ba ma adana cikakken adireshin IP ɗinka.
privacyDataPoint3: Duk wani ra'ayi da ka bayar da son rai, kamar wuri, kima, da sharhi. Dukkan ra'ayoyin ana miƙa su ba tare da suna ba.
privacyUsageText: Ana haɗa bayanan da ba a san sunansu ba da muke tattarawa kuma ana amfani da su don kunna Cibiyar Al'ummarmu, tana nuna kididdiga da bayanai na musamman na yanki. Yana taimaka wa kowa ya fahimci aikin ainihi na ISP daban-daban a wurare daban-daban.
contactIntro: Za mu so mu ji daga gare ku. Ko kuna da tambaya, ra'ayi, ko neman haɗin gwiwa, kada ku yi jinkirin tuntuɓar mu.
